com.esri.mo2.data.odb
Class CacheInputStream

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--java.io.InputStream
        |
        +--java.io.ObjectInputStream
              |
              +--com.esri.mo2.data.odb.CacheInputStream
All Implemented Interfaces:
DataInput, ObjectInput, ObjectStreamConstants
public class CacheInputStream
extends ObjectInputStream

An ObjectInputStream which supports sharing objects with other CacheInputStream(s). When multiple ObjectInputStreams serialize the same object, a complete (deep) representation of the object is placed in the separate streams. This implementation avoids that problem, but does assume that access by multiple threads is protected above (in the object hierarchy).
